errors.name: MaxOpenOrdersReached
errors.msg: Maximum number of open orders reached

fields.name: market_id
docs: Unique identifier for the market

fields.name: name
docs: The event being predicted (e.g., "tJUP/TRD")

fields.name: hype_price
docs: Current price for Hype outcome (0-1000000, representing 0 to 1 TRD)

fields.name: flop_price
docs: Current price for Flop outcome (0-1000000, representing 0 to 1 TRD)

fields.name: hype_liquidity
docs: Total liquidity for Hype (in TRD)

fields.name: flop_liquidity
docs: Total liquidity for Flop (in TRD)

fields.name: total_hype_shares
docs: Total number of Hype shares issued

fields.name: total_flop_shares
docs: Total number of Flop shares issued

fields.name: total_volume
docs: Total trading volume (in TRD) for all resolutions

fields.name: mint
docs: Mint $TRD token

fields.name: ts
docs: Timestamp of the init

fields.name: open_orders_count
docs: Total number of open orders in this market

fields.name: next_order_id
docs: Next available order ID

fields.name: fee_bps
docs: Fees applied to trades (in basis points, e.g., 1.131% fee)

fields.name: fee_vault
docs: Vault to Receive fees

fields.name: is_active
docs: Whether the market is currently active for trading

fields.name: current_question_id
docs: Index of the current week in the weekly_results array initialized with default values

fields.name: current_question
docs: The question or prediction topic for the current week

fields.name: price
docs: The price of the order (in TRD)

fields.name: total_amount
docs: The total amount of TRD committed to this order

fields.name: total_shares
docs: The total number of shares to be purchased

fields.name: question
docs: The question or prediction topic for this week

fields.name: start_time
docs: Start timestamp of the week

fields.name: end_time
docs: End timestamp of the week

fields.name: hype_liquidity
docs: Total liquidity for Hype (in TRD)

fields.name: flop_liquidity
docs: Total liquidity for Flop (in TRD)

fields.name: winning_direction
docs: The winning direction (Hype, Flop or None)

fields.name: final_hype_price
docs: Final price for Hype outcome at the end of the week

fields.name: final_flop_price
docs: Final price for Flop outcome at the end of the week

fields.name: total_hype_shares
docs: Total number of Hype shares issued

fields.name: total_flop_shares
docs: Total number of Flop shares issued

fields.name: total_deposits
docs: The total value of deposits the user has made (in TRD)
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_withdraws
docs: The total value of withdrawals the user has made (in TRD)
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: opened_orders
docs: The number of orders the user has opened
